titleStmt.title: Newes from Dvnkirke being a speciall relation of certaine passages there : wherein is discovered the intentions and agitations of divers of this kingdome endeavouring to engage Don Francisco de Mela, commander generall of the King of Spaines forces in those countries, to set forth sundry Dunkirke Frigots into our seas : as also of divers priests and Iesuites, that lying there for transportation hither, were taken at sea by some of the states-men of war : with 3 barques sent by the said Jesuites for their transportation and the carriage of much ammunition and money intended for New Castle to relieve the malignants against the Parliament which priests are now imprisoned by the states at Roterdam / by G. H.
titleStmt.author: G. H.

titleStmt.title: Newes from Dvnkirke being a speciall relation of certaine passages there : wherein is discovered the intentions and agitations of divers of this kingdome endeavouring to engage Don Francisco de Mela, commander generall of the King of Spaines forces in those countries, to set forth sundry Dunkirke Frigots into our seas : as also of divers priests and Iesuites, that lying there for transportation hither, were taken at sea by some of the states-men of war : with 3 barques sent by the said Jesuites for their transportation and the carriage of much ammunition and money intended for New Castle to relieve the malignants against the Parliament which priests are now imprisoned by the states at Roterdam / by G. H.
